data.title: ITC upholds GoPro's patent claim, bans Insta360 products in US. GoPro (NASDAQ: GPRO) victorious in patent dispute.
data.description: Today, in San Mateo, California, GoPro, Inc. disclosed that the U.S. International Trade Commission (ITC) has upheld the prior ruling by the administrative law judge regarding Insta360's infringement on GoPro's products. The ruling pertains to Insta360 importing and selling products in the United States that violate GoPro's intellectual property rights. GoPro's stock is listed on the NASDAQ under the symbol GPRO.

data.title: Arcfra launches Neutree for scalable enterprise AI infrastructure, a Model-as-a-Service platform in 2026.
data.description: In Singapore on February 26, 2026, Arcfra introduced Arcfra Neutree, an enterprise-level Model-as-a-Service (MaaS) platform tailored for efficient AI operations. This innovative cloud and AI-ready infrastructure aims to streamline AI services. It signifies a significant step in industrializing AI processes, putting AI innovation at the forefront.

data.title: RIMAN wins iF DESIGN AWARD 2026 for ICD Dermatology Line's packaging design, boosting global brand reputation.
data.description: A renowned South Korean skincare and wellness brand, RIMAN, based in Seoul, revealed on February 26, 2026, that its latest ICD Dermatology Line comprising boosters, serums, and creams, has been honored with the prestigious iF DESIGN AWARD 2026 in the Packaging Design sector. The cutting-edge packaging design showcases RIMAN's commitment to innovation and aesthetic appeal, garnering recognition in the industry.

data.title: Envision ships first commercial green ammonia cargo to South Korea from China, reducing carbon emissions.
data.description: In Chifeng, China on February 26, 2026, Envision, a top green technology firm, announced the initiation of the inaugural international delivery of green ammonia from Chifeng, Inner Mongolia to LOTTE Fine Chemical, a prominent chemical company in South Korea. This milestone shipment signifies the first of its kind globally.

data.title: Biglari Capital urges Jack in the Box shareholders to vote against David Goebel. Largest shareholder with 9.86% stake.
data.description: After 17 years of unsuccessful leadership, it is challenging to reverse the trend in just one more year. Biglari Capital Corp., the primary shareholder of Jack in the Box Inc. (NasdaqGS: JACK) holding a 9.86% ownership stake, has issued an urgent call to action.

Japan’s 2-year JGB auction saw a lowest price of 100.0950 and an average price of 100.1080, with 41.78% of bids accepted at the lowest price. The bid-to-cover ratio stood at 3.32, down from 3.88 in the previous auction.

data.title: Ransomware incidents rise by 50% in 2025, with payments stagnant. Report indicates attackers facing challenges for profits.
data.description: According to a recent report from Chainalysis, ransomware attackers are finding it increasingly challenging to generate profits, partly due to regulatory crackdowns and a growing number of victims refusing to pay. These factors have resulted in a decline in ransom proceeds for the attackers. The report highlights the effort ransomware attackers are putting into their activities relative to the diminishing returns they are now experiencing. This indicates a shift in the ransomware landscape, with attackers facing more obstacles in their attempts to cash in on their malicious activities.

data.title: Stores.com, Inc. now serves 17+ million customers as a multi-brand e-commerce platform. Correction made to news release.
data.description: In the updated news release, Stores.com has been identified as a multi-brand e-commerce platform catering to over 17 million customers. The announcement was made on 26-Feb-2026 through PR Newswire by Stores.com, Inc. Prior information may contain inaccuracies, and this corrected version provides the accurate details.

data.title: Sen. Warren calls for transparency on Trump family's crypto bank application. She demands unredacted application for review.
data.description: Senator Elizabeth Warren (D-Massachusetts) raised questions during a Senate session regarding the Trump family's request to launch a stablecoin bank tied to their World Liberty Financial (CRYPTO: WLFI) platform. Senator Warren insisted on transparency during her interrogation of Comptroller of the Currency Jonathan Gould about whether all legal requirements were followed in the bank charter application submitted by World Liberty Financial, a company co-owned by President Donald Trump's children. As per OCC regulations, applicants must disclose all principal shareholders holding a minimum of a 10% direct or indirect interest in the proposed bank, with failure to comply leading to potential rejection. Senator Warren demanded access to the complete application to ensure that all necessary disclosures were included, along with Senator Tim Scott (R-South Carolina), who chairs the Banking Committee. For further details, the full article can be found on Benzinga.com.

data.title: Vitalik Buterin plans Ethereum's quantum-resilience strategy, focusing on 4 key areas for upgrades to handle future challenges.
data.description: A prominent figure in the Ethereum community highlighted the need for improvements in four key areas: validator signatures, data storage, user accounts, and proofs. However, implementing these changes is expected to be a challenging process.
